title: When I want to send a video or a photo not all the pics or videos that is in my phone appears in app
content: When I want to send a video or a photo not all the pictures or videos that is in my phone appears in the gallery for example when I went to send a video it appears only 14 videos I can send but when I go to the Google photos there's actually 144 videos it's the same for the pictures it happens recently I haven't changed any settings on the phone or the app this issue is with all the apps
